titleInfo.title: Gerald Fanion, Dir. of Shelby County Dept. of Community Relations, 1968

subject.topic: Community on the Move for Equality

mods.abstract: This is an interview with Gerald Fanion. He was the Director of County Department of Community Relations at that time. In this interview, he talked about the escalation of the marches into macing. He also elaborated on the formation of COME and its connection with SCLC; described his reactions to the assasination of King.
